General.Name: Neway CNC Equipment Suzhou Co Ltd
General.Description: Neway CNC Equipment (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. manufactures industrial machinery in China and internationally. The company produces computer numerically-controlled machine tools, numerical control systems, actuating devices, and other products. It also provides after sales and other services. Neway CNC Equipment (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. -  Ma
1.Title: Pres of Neway Machine Tool R&D Institute
